name: Turtlee's Adventures Demo
description:
It´s  a Demo for PC with only 4 levels.

the complete game is a F2P game for Android, downloadable from Google Play

Comments are appreciated to improve it. Thanks for playing, enjoy!

Platform game in which our protagonist Turtlee will have to reach the finish line before time runs out through beautiful landscapes full of enemies and coins to collect.

With the coins you buy the ability to shoot or the immunity to be able to overcome the final bosses of the levels.
